Downwelling longwave radiation ( L↓) is a function of the integrated temperature of the atmospheric column and its effective emissivity. We estimate paleo values of L↓ ydh for our model by directly adjusting our modern measured L↓ 0dh based on changes in temperature, θ
ydh .
